Literature.Title: Ω76: A designed antimicrobial peptide to combat carbapenem- and tigecycline-resistant Acinetobacter baumannii.
Literature.Author: Nagarajan D, Roy N, Kulkarni O, Nanajkar N, Datey A, Ravichandran S, Thakur C, T S, Aprameya IV, Sarma SP, Chakravortty D, Chandra N

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli K12 MG1655(MIC=4µg/ml),Shigella boydii MTCC 11947(MIC=2µg/ml),Shigella flexneri MTCC 1457(MIC=16µg/ml),Salmonella enterica MTCC 9844(MIC=128µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa MTCC 3542(MIC=32µg/ml),Citrobacter koseri MTCC 1657(MIC=16µg/ml),Haemophilus influenzae MTCC 621(MIC=64µg/ml),Bordetella bronchiseptica MTCC 6837(MIC=0.5µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus MTCC 425(MIC=1µg/ml),Staphylococcus haemolyticus MTCC 3383(MIC=32µg/ml),Corynebacterium glutamicum MTCC 2679(MIC=4µg/ml),Mycobacterium smegmatis mc2-155(MIC=64µg/ml)
